message: Let's be fair, Bob. I think this is a good starting point.
I think we should split it equally after taxes, I lose 5% of the value each round.
Bob, my offer is still the fairest. You're losing money with every round, remember?
I'd rather lose a bit more value than give you the bigger share.
Bob, let's be real.  We both lose if this keeps up. I'm offering a fair 50/50 split. Take it or leave it.
